# Pull Request Template

## Summary

Provide a concise description of the change and the motivation.

## Type of change

- [ ] Bugfix
- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Docs
- [ ] Chore
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Tests

## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the Contributing guidelines.
- [ ] Code is formatted and linted where applicable.
- [ ] Tests and/or examples have been added or updated when relevant.

## Related issues

Fixes: #<issue-number> (if applicable)

## Testing and verification

Describe how this change was tested (commands, environment, steps) and how to verify it locally.

Example:

```bash
make test
```
